description: Tipline newsletter schedule (how often it should be sent)
Explanation about tipline newsletter schedule... after that, there is a drop-down where the user can choose periodicity, day of week and time
defaultMessage: Send the newsletter to all subscribed user every:

description: The context here is a time... for example, at 10am
Explanation about tipline newsletter delivery, in tipline newsletter settings page
defaultMessage: If the content is not changed between two scheduled sendouts, the newsletter will not be sent.

description: Counter that shows how many characters can still be input for the tipline content
Explanation about a placeholder that can be used in the tipline newsletter introduction, so {channel} here must not be translated.
defaultMessage: Use the placeholder \{channel\} to insert the name of the messaging service automatically.

description: Explanation about a placeholder that can be used in the tipline newsletter introduction, so {date} here must not be translated.
defaultMessage: Use the placeholder \{date\} to insert the date the newsletter is sent automatically.

description: Button label to add a new article URL to the tipline newsletter content
